summary: This is where I'll share helpful scripts that I've made for various mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]Undivide's Script Hub[/size][/b]

This is where I will share various scripts from my own mods, released or not, with the community.
This resource includes the .psc and .pex versions of each script. Each script has been commented appropriately with descriptions of what it does.
This resource has been created under the assumption that all who download it have knowledge of the Creation Kit and how Papyrus works. 


[b][color=#ff0000]HOW TO USE:[/color][/b]

Extract Undi's Scripts.7z and drag/drop the files to your Data/Scripts folder.


[b][color=#ff0000]CURRENT SCRIPTS:

[/color][color=#ff7700][size=3]/!\[/size][/color] [/b]JAPF "Transformation" Scripts

From my J.a.p.f follower mod.

[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]/!\[/size] [/color][/b]__0TranslationScript

I use this script to make ships "sail".

This script is to be used with activators. Can be modified for use with movable statics.
Note, you must modify the .nif of the activator/movable static in order for translatetoref() to work.
[url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1383367-getting-collisions-to-move-with-translateto/#entry20988707]SEE THIS POST FOR DETAILS.[/url]

You must also add the Movable keyword to the activator being moved in the Creation Kit.
[/center]
author: Undivide
